sentences.english: He won a few headers and calmed things down.
sentences.chinese: 赢得了几次头球争顶并且使情况稳定下来。

sentences.english: When her statement was read a very cleat light was cast upon the situation.
sentences.chinese: 她的声明宣读后，情况便显得非常清楚了。

sentences.english: Newton's law is not applicable to any case.
sentences.chinese: 牛顿定律并不适合于任何情况。

sentences.english: We might even see-saw between both counterproductive poles.
sentences.chinese: 我们甚至可能看到双方针锋相对的情况。

sentences.english: In most cases, it is a good idea to include them.
sentences.chinese: 大部分情况下，把教育时间写进去是个好主意。

sentences.english: In terms of overall child protection, the United States is certainly in the top echelon.
sentences.chinese: 从保护儿童的总体情况来看，美国肯定名列前茅。

sentences.english: At (long) last we found out what had really happened.
sentences.chinese: 最后，我们终于弄清了实际发生的情况。

sentences.english: The development of modified dipped nylon 66 cord and its application were described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍改性锦纶66浸渍帘布的研制与应用情况。

sentences.english: How is your life, situation, etc?
sentences.chinese: 你的生活，情况等等如何？

sentences.english: It was in this context that international support and scrutiny were critical.
sentences.chinese: 正因为是在这种情况下，国际援助和监督才很重要。

sentences.english: Ideally, every key value in the index is unique.
sentences.chinese: 理想情况是，索引中的每个键值都是惟一的。

sentences.english: No junketing activity would be conducted on official expenses without permission of the company.
sentences.chinese: 在未得到公司授权情况下，不得以公费进行宴请活动。

sentences.english: I will apprise you of the situation .
An airbag that deploys a second later than it should is worse than no airbag at all.
sentences.chinese: 晚一秒钟展开气囊比没有气囊的情况更糟糕。

sentences.english: The Chinese government has demanded that U.S.-led NATO bear all responsibilities for this incident, and the Chinese side will continue to pay close attention to the development of the matter.
sentences.chinese: 中方将继续密切关注情况的发展。

sentences.english: He was getting through games last season on painkilling injections.
sentences.chinese: 去季他都是在注射止痛剂的情况下坚持上场的。

definition: to appear/to arise/to emerge/to show up
to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
